values: （长度或距离）长的；漫长的；耗时多的；长期的；长时间的；长久的；远期的；长音节的；渴望的；热切的；（金融）看涨的；持有大量…的
长音节；长母音；长期持有的资产；远期合约；长期债券；长裤；长尺寸；（Long）郎（人名）
长时间地；长久地；长期地；很久地；始终；一直
渴望；向往；极想；盼望；渴求；巴望

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 长度，长；时间的长短；（语）音长

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指诚心诚意地渴望某事或物。
通常指急迫不安地渴望或向往，着重怀有柔情或热情。
原义指对食物或饮料的渴求，引申指全力以求。
通常指有很大程度的把握，但仍含有预料之意，或预计某事或某行动的发生。
语气较正式庄重，着重渴望的力量与热切，常含有强烈的意图和目的。
语气较弱，多指难于实现或不可能实现的愿望。
语气强，指极殷切地盼望着，这种盼望侧重于很难或不可能得到的东西。有时也指一般愿望，但含一定感情色彩。
一般指所想要的东西是切望得到的东西，能弥补实际需要。
指对愿望实现有一定信心的希望。

word_group.phrase: go a long way towards doing sth.

word_group.brief_definition: 很久前；很久以前；长久以前
最终；长期地, 从长远来看
漫长的道路；漫长的路；长路

bilingual.source: The giraffe has a very long neck.
It has a long body and short legs.
bilingual.target: 它有长长的身体和短腿。

bilingual.source: The ostrich has long legs and a long neck.
bilingual.target: 鸵鸟有长长的腿和脖子。
这只山羊有一对长长的角。
我们有一个长长的待办清单。

bilingual.source: He drew a long and thin line.

bilingual.target: 她的家族有一个很长的历史。

list.abstract: long，全称long int，是编程语言中一个表示长整型数据的关键字。 long含有4个字节，默认为有符号长整型，其取值范围为-2147483648~2147483647。

语法标注解释 long英音：[lɔŋ] 美音：[lɔŋ] KK：[lɔŋ] DJ：[lɔŋ] long1 形容词 a. 1. 长的;远的 The railway is 1000 miles long. 这条铁路长一千英里。 2. 长久的 She was abroad for a long time. 她在国外呆了很久。 3. 冗长的;过久的 He gave a long, tiring report. 他的报告冗长,令人厌倦。 4. (记忆力)能记得久远的 She had a long memory. 她记性很好。 5. 希望渺茫的 6. 【语】长音的 副词 ad. 1. 长久地 You can keep my book as long as you like. 我的书你要借多久都随你的便。 2. 始终 She worked all day long. 她工作了一整天。 名词 n. 1. 长时间;长时期[U] I am not going away for long. 我离开的时间不会长。 2. 【语】长音节[C] 3. 长裤[P]

yingyinNormal.en: How? They have very long tongues.
yingyinNormal.zh: 怎么做？蝴蝶有一根非常长的口器。

yingyinNormal.en: The long grass.
yingyinNormal.zh: 长长的草。

yingyinNormal.en: Daddy pig says the electricity won't be back for a long long time.
yingyinNormal.zh: 猪爸爸说电要很长的时间才会再来。

yingyinNormal.en: Everything in between is a bit of a mystery. Wow. That is a long way. It's a long way.
yingyinNormal.zh: 途中要经历什么无从知晓。路程挺长的呢。路程确实很长。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《大卫·贝克汉姆：探索未知之境》

yingyinNormal.en: It is going to be a long night. A long day will follow. But it will be well worth it in the end.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这将会是一个漫长的夜晚，明天依然将会是一场苦战，但对于最终的胜利来说都值得。

yingyinNormal.en: How long will that be, exactly? I would say, exactly a long time. Oh, but George and I want to do some dancing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那到底要等多久呢？我只能说，确实需要很长的时间。噢，但是乔治和我想跳一会儿舞。

yingyinNormal.en: It has been a long day. Now it is time for bed.
yingyinNormal.zh: 今天真是漫长的一天，现在是时候睡觉了。

yingyinNormal.en: Look at me, I've got nose squashing. I've got a long neck, like a giraffe.
yingyinNormal.zh: 看我，我的鼻子歪了。我有一个长长的脖子，像长劲鹿一样。

yingyinNormal.en: All right, let me rephrase the question. Why are you wearing long underwear?
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，让我重新表述下问题，你干嘛要穿长的内衣裤啊？

yingyinNormal.en: It has been a long day. Now it is time for bed. Good night my little piggies.
yingyinNormal.zh: 今天真是漫长的一天，现在是时候睡觉了。晚安，我的小猪猪。

yingyinNormal.en: Do you hope to stay long in the country, Mr Bingley? Just a few weeks. For the shooting.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你会在乡村里呆很长的时间么？只是几个星期，是来打猎的。

yingyinNormal.en: Peppa and George can not see each other. Peppa and George love playing in the long grass.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩奇和乔治看不到对方。佩奇和乔治喜欢在长长的草丛里玩。

yingyinNormal.en: She is scaly, like a dragon. Can she breathe fire? No, but she has a very long tongue. Wow.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她有鳞片，就像龙一样。那么她能够喷火吗？不能，但是她有一个长长的舌头。哇。

yingyinNormal.en: You got to start small and build up slowly, even if it takes eight years. Eight long years.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你得小火开始慢慢加料慢慢炖，哪怕得炖他个足足八年。八个漫长的年头。

yingyinNormal.en: Hello, Grandpa Pig speaking. Hello, Grandpa Pig, could you help us cut some very long grass?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你好，我是猪爷爷，请说吧。你好啊，猪爷爷，你可以帮我们割一些长长的草吗？

yingyinNormal.en: It's not doing anything! You will have to be patient, Peppa. It will take a long time to grow.
yingyinNormal.zh: 它什么也没做！你必须耐心，佩佩。它需要很长的一段时间生长。

yingyinNormal.en: Down the crewmen's passage, then go right and left again at the stairs. You'll come to a long corridor.
yingyinNormal.zh: 左转，走船员通道，右转，到楼梯左转，就到一条长的走廊。

yingyinNormal.en: Don't worry, George. I've got an idea. Could we have two of the long balloons, please? Watch this, everybody.
yingyinNormal.zh: 别担心乔治 我有主意了，给我们两个长的气球好吗？好了，大家看好了。

yingyinNormal.en: And he did it every day. And Frank had a two-foot long bong under his bed that was constantly being fired up.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他每天都这么干，弗兰克床底下有一杆2英尺长的烟枪，永远在燃烧。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay. Do you think maybe it's tight because you're wearing long underwear? Yes, of course that's why it's tight.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，你不觉得之所以会紧是因为你里面穿了套长的内衣裤吗？废话，当然是因为这个。

exam_freq_info.chinese: (go a long way to doing)对...帮助很大
(go back a long way)相识很久

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 比较久的；较长的；（long的比较级）
n. 长度；长；一段；一片；程度；球距；时间长度；身高

word_family.mean: adj. 长的；长久的；耗时的；较大量的；长元音的；小的；渺茫的；远期（获利）的；混合的；大量的；充足的；大量供应的

word_level_phrase_info.phrase: go a long way towards doing sth.
go a long way to doing sth.

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 还有很长的路要走；还有很大差距
word_level_phrase_info.phrase: have a long way to go

sense_info_list.en: lasting or taking a great amount of time

examination_example.sentence: Helping forests flourish as valuable "carbon sinks" <highlight>long</highlight> into the future may require reducing their capacity to absorb carbon now.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在未来很长一段时间里，要想让森林成为有价值的“碳汇”，就需要降低它们现在吸收碳的能力。

examination_example.sentence: Unfortunately, the <highlight>long</highlight>-term costs of using simple quantitative metrics to assess researcher merit are likely to be quite great.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不幸的是，使用简单的定量指标来评估研究人员价值的长期成本可能是相当大的。

examination_example.sentence: Britain's Labor Party, as its name implies, has <highlight>long</highlight> been associated with trade unionism.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 英国工党，顾名思义，长期以来一直与工会主义联系在一起。

examination_example.sentence: I'm experiencing increased zeal for working out since I no <highlight>longer</highlight> carry the burden of a disappointing morning weigh-in.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我对锻炼的热情越来越高涨，因为我不再被每天早上量体重带来的压力所困扰。

examination_example.sentence: Models are no <highlight>longer</highlight> under peer pressure.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 模特们不再承受同行的压力。

examination_example.sentence: Employment is no <highlight>longer</highlight> a precondition to get insurance.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 就业不再是获得保险的先决条件。

sense_info_list.en: measuring a great distance from end to end

examination_example.sentence: Even dairy farms, where robots do a small share of milking, have a <highlight>long</highlight> way to go before they're automated.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 即便是机器人能做一小部分挤奶工作的奶牛场，要实现自动化也得走很长的路。

examination_example.sentence: While there's a <highlight>long</highlight> way to go, the trend lines for renewables are spiking.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然还有很长的路要走，但可再生能源的趋势线正在飙升。

examination_example.sentence: We still have a <highlight>long</highlight> way to go to get back to full employment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 要恢复充分就业，我们还有很长的路要走。

examination_example.sentence: If you see a conversation as a fight or competition, you can win by cheating as <highlight>long</highlight> as you don't get caught.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果把谈话当成一场战斗或比赛，那么只要不被发现，你就可以通过作弊取胜。

examination_example.sentence: Those things might be social, sporting, creative or completely random — it doesn't matter, so <highlight>long</highlight> as they're enjoyable.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些事情可能是社交、运动、创作或完全随机的事情—没关系，只要它们能令你愉快。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Long</highlight> is Britain's best-known Land Artist.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 隆是英国最著名的地景艺术家。

examination_example.sentence: The British land art, typified by Richard <highlight>Long</highlight>'s piece, was not only more domestically scaled, but a lot quirkier than its American counterpart.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 以理查德·隆的作品为代表的英国地景艺术，不仅规模更大，而且要比美国的同类作品古怪得多。

examination_example.sentence: It requires minimal effort and goes a <highlight>long</highlight> way.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 认识和你不熟的同事只需要极小的努力，却能带来持续的好效果。

sense_info_list.zh: (go a long way to doing)对...帮助很大

examination_example.sentence: This one may be a bit more difficult to pull off, but it can go a <highlight>long</highlight> way to achieving results.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这一点可能更难实现，但却对实现效果大有帮助。

sense_info_list.zh: (go back a long way)相识很久

examination_example.sentence: Some of their ties go back a <highlight>long</highlight> way.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们之间（公共部门工会和左翼政治力量）的一些关系由来已久。

sense_info_list.en: (of odds or a chance) reflecting or representing a low level of probability
(of shares, bonds, or other assets) bought in advance, with the expectation of a rise in price
(of a vowel) categorized as long with regard to quality and length
(of a vowel or syllable) having the greater of the two recognized duration
have a strong wish or desire

word_usage.usage: (for) long和(for) a long time均用以表示“长期、长时间”，肯定句用(for) a long time，如：We've been friends a long time. 我们是老朋友了；(for) long通常用于否定句或疑问句，一般放在句末，与too、enough、as、so、seldom等词连用时才用于肯定句中，如：I stayed out in the sun for too long. 我在太阳底下呆的时间太长了。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 有一定长度/距离的; 长的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 使变长；使（元音，音节）拖长
n. 长度；长；一段；一片；程度；球距；时间长度；身高

word_family.mean: adj. 长的；长久的；耗时的；较大量的；长元音的；小的；渺茫的；远期（获利）的；混合的；大量的；充足的；大量供应的

sense_info_list.en: lasting or taking a great amount of time

examination_example.sentence: How <highlight>long</highlight> did your team spend in the jungle?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你的团队在丛林里呆了多长时间？

examination_example.sentence: One reason in particular why these people had been promoted was that they had been around the <highlight>longest</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些人被提拔的一个特别原因是，他们在公司工作的时间最长。

examination_example.sentence: But I think it will take a very <highlight>long</highlight> time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但我认为这需要很长时间。

sense_info_list.en: measuring a great distance from end to end
sense_info_list.zh: 有一定长度/距离的; 长的

examination_example.sentence: Moreover, vision is used by micro bats to travel over <highlight>long</highlight> distances, beyond the range of echolocation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 此外，微型蝙蝠利用视觉进行长距离旅行，超出了回声定位的范围。

examination_example.sentence: This teaches them to be understanding of and sympathetic towards others—qualities sure to take them a <highlight>long</highlight> way in life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这教导他们理解和同情他人，这些品质一定能让他们的人生之路走得长远。

examination_example.sentence: I think we're a <highlight>long</highlight> way away from having virtual beings that have the ability to pre-sell content.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我认为，我们距离拥有能够预售内容的虚拟实体还有很长的路要走。

sense_info_list.en: have a strong wish or desire

word_usage.usage: long作名词“长期”，是不可数名词。for long意为“长久”，常用于否定句或疑问句中。

long作副词“长久地”，主要用于修饰静态动词，表示时间延续之长。
示例：He remained long in London.
他在伦敦呆了很久。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指对未来的期望, 一般是对好事的期待。
书面用词, 指对将要或预料要发生的事怍于期待状态。
语气较正式庄重, 着重渴望的力量与热切, 常含有强烈的意图和目的。
通常指有很大程度的把握, 但仍含有预料之意, 或预计某事或某行动的发生。
指希望得到积极、有利的结果, 所期待的可能实现, 也可能不会实现。
语气强, 指极殷切地盼望着, 这种盼望侧重于很难或不可能得到的东西。有时也指一般愿望, 但含一定感情色彩。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 有一定长度/距离的; 长的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 使变长；使（元音，音节）拖长
n. 长度；长；一段；一片；程度；球距；时间长度；身高

word_family.mean: adj. 长的；长久的；耗时的；较大量的；长元音的；小的；渺茫的；远期（获利）的；混合的；大量的；充足的；大量供应的

sense_info_list.en: lasting or taking a great amount of time

examination_example.sentence: By most measures, San Jose is no <highlight>longer</highlight> a place where low-income, or even middle-income families, can afford to live.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从大多数方面来看，圣何塞不再是一个低收入甚至中等收入家庭能够负担得起生活的地方。

examination_example.sentence: A university of Chicago study shows people who sleep well live <highlight>longer</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 芝加哥大学的一项研究表明，睡眠好的人寿命更长。

examination_example.sentence: Easy-going people can also live a relatively <highlight>long</highlight> life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 性格随和的人也能活得比较长。

sense_info_list.en: measuring a great distance from end to end
sense_info_list.zh: 有一定长度/距离的; 长的

examination_example.sentence: Driving too <highlight>long</highlight> a distance.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 驾驶距离太远。

examination_example.sentence: Rural kids used to walk a <highlight>long</highlight> way to school in the old days.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 以前，农村孩子上学要走很长一段路。

examination_example.sentence: The book is co-authored by <highlight>Long</highlight> Island University's philosophy professor Michael Soupios and economics professor Panos Mourdoukoutas.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这本书由长岛大学哲学教授迈克尔·苏皮奥斯和经济学教授帕诺斯·穆尔杜库塔斯合著。

examination_example.sentence: Swollen expectations have been popped and a <highlight>long</highlight> list of promised efficiencies have been reversed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 膨胀的期望已经破灭，一长串承诺的提高功效的方法已经被逆转。

sense_info_list.en: have a strong wish or desire

word_usage.usage:
long作副词“长久地”，主要用于修饰静态动词，表示时间延续之长。
示例：He remained long in London.
他在伦敦呆了很久。
long作名词“长期”，是不可数名词。for long意为“长久”，常用于否定句或疑问句中。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指对未来的期望，一般是对好事的期待。
书面用词，指对将要或预料要发生的事怍于期待状态。
语气较正式庄重，着重渴望的力量与热切，常含有强烈的意图和目的。
通常指有很大程度的把握，但仍含有预料之意，或预计某事或某行动的发生。
指希望得到积极、有利的结果，所期待的可能实现，也可能不会实现。
语气强，指极殷切地盼望着，这种盼望侧重于很难或不可能得到的东西。有时也指一般愿望，但含一定感情色彩。

exam_freq_info.chinese: (用于名词后强调某事发生在某整段时间)
(在某一时间或事件之前或以后)很久地

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 最终；长期地；从长远来看

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 长度；长；一段；一片；程度；球距；时间长度；身高

word_family.mean: adj. 长的；长久的；耗时的；较大量的；长元音的；小的；渺茫的；远期（获利）的；混合的；大量的；充足的；大量供应的

examination_example.sentence: Having said that, I did not know for a <highlight>long</highlight> time what I was looking for.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 话虽如此，我很长一段时间都不知道自己在寻找什么。

examination_example.sentence: They stay in front of screens for too <highlight>long</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们在屏幕前停留的时间太长。

examination_example.sentence: Art is <highlight>long</highlight>, life is short.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 艺术是漫长的，生命是短暂的。

examination_example.sentence: Music has <highlight>long</highlight> been considered to be an enjoyable pastime for many people.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 长期以来，音乐一直被认为是许多人享受的消遣。

examination_example.sentence: It's rare to hear someone say, "I wish that speaker had spoken <highlight>longer</highlight>."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 很少听到有人说，“我希望那个演讲者说得更久一些。”

examination_example.sentence: For Western designers China and its rich culture have <highlight>long</highlight> been an inspiration for Western creative.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对于西方设计师来说，中国及其丰富的文化长期以来一直是西方创意的灵感来源。

examination_example.sentence: "As <highlight>long</highlight> as I get close enough, no criminal can escape from me," he said.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “只要我足够靠近，就没有罪犯能从我身边逃脱，”他说。

examination_example.sentence: She often tells me that I can be anyone I want as <highlight>long</highlight> as I'm confident of myself.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她经常告诉我，我可以成为任何我想要成为的人，只要我对自己有信心。

examination_example.sentence: As <highlight>long</highlight> as there have been codes, people have tried to break them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 只要存在代码，人们就试图打破它们。

examination_example.sentence: I kept trying at the song, no <highlight>longer</highlight> getting angry at myself.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我一直试着唱这首歌，不再对自己生气。

examination_example.sentence: Reading opened new worlds to me. I wasn't alone any <highlight>longer</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 阅读为我打开了新的世界。我不再孤单了。

examination_example.sentence: China is no <highlight>longer</highlight> just another market; in many senses it has become the market.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 中国不再只是一个普通的市场；在很多意义上，它已经成为了市场。

sense_info_list.zh: (用于名词后强调某事发生在某整段时间)

examination_example.sentence: You will feel energized all day <highlight>long</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你一整天都会感到精力充沛。

examination_example.sentence: They stayed up all night <highlight>long</highlight> singing and dancing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们唱歌跳舞，彻夜未眠。

examination_example.sentence: Big name shows all summer <highlight>long</highlight>!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 整个夏天都是大牌秀！

sense_info_list.zh: (在某一时间或事件之前或以后)很久地

examination_example.sentence: Before <highlight>long</highlight> I decided to make a change.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不久之后，我决定做出改变。

examination_example.sentence: Not very <highlight>long</highlight> ago, it was also unthinkable that a virus would shut down nations.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 就在不久前，一种病毒会让许多国家停滞不前也是不可想象的。

examination_example.sentence: Athletes and scientists have <highlight>long</highlight> known that meal timing affects performance.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 运动员和科学家早就知道吃饭时间会影响表现。

examination_example.sentence: Ten minutes spent in this way could save you quite a lot of time in the <highlight>long</highlight> run.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从长远来看，用这种方法花十分钟可以为你节省很多时间。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 长度；长；一段；一片；程度；球距；时间长度；身高
adj. 比较久的；较长的；（long的比较级）

word_family.mean: adj. 长的；长久的；耗时的；较大量的；长元音的；小的；渺茫的；远期（获利）的；混合的；大量的；充足的；大量供应的

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 很久前；很久以前；长久以前
漫长的道路；漫长的路；长路

sense_info_list.en: measuring a great distance from end to end

examination_example.sentence: How <highlight>long</highlight> will it take the woman to get there?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这个女人到那里要多长时间？

examination_example.sentence: Then he wanted a change to <highlight>long</highlight> hair.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后他想换一头长发。

examination_example.sentence: Before <highlight>long</highlight>, the boy was very hungry and thirsty.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不久以后，男孩又饿又渴。

examination_example.sentence: As <highlight>long</highlight> as we pull together, we'll make it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 只要我们齐心协力，我们就能成功。

word_usage.usage: long作名词“长期”，是不可数名词。for long意为“长久”，常用于否定句或疑问句中。

long作副词“长久地”，主要用于修饰静态动词，表示时间延续之长。
示例：He remained long in London.
他在伦敦呆了很久。
